title: First born = Premier-ne
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Susan Huycke, Colin Low and Joan Henson
brief_description: A film of poetic intent, set in Canada’s Pacific Rim National Park, where a woman giving birth, dreams of the growing infant. From the beauty of the images and the evocative music and sound effects, the viewers are impelled toward their own interpretation. Sound film without words.
